name: Egg Manchurian
description: A spicy Indo-Chinese dish made with boiled eggs tossed in a tangy Manchurian sauce.
instructions: Cut the boiled eggs in halves. Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste, add sauces and toss eggs until coated. Serve hot.

name: Pure Vegetable Bowl
description: A healthy mix of seasonal vegetables tossed in olive oil and herbs.
instructions: Steam or sauté the vegetables lightly in olive oil. Sprinkle herbs and salt. Serve warm in a bowl.

name: Egg Masala Ramen
description: An Indian twist on the classic ramen with spiced egg curry and noodles.
instructions: Cook ramen as per instructions. In a separate pan, sauté onion, tomato, and spices. Add eggs and combine with ramen.
